description:
Scenes of the Death Night slaughtering the invaders at Carne from EP03, then a title card crediting the original story and original character design.
Then the flashback of a raid on Nazarick while Yggdrasil was running, and a title card crediting the director, series composition, and character design.
The flashback continues, and a voice over about Yggdrasil and DMMO games begins. Madhouse gets credited.
The flashback and voice over continue, and then the title screen for Yggdrasil is shown.
Then the events just before the Yggdrasil shutdown are shown while the narration continues.
The OP song "Clattanoia" starts playing at about 0:42, and random scenes are shown for a while until the anime air dates are shown. At that point, Ainz does a voice over ordering you to surrender or die painfully.

titles.title: 【オーバーロード】プロモーションビデオ第2弾
